# Covia Web Application

A modern, production-grade TypeScript + Next.js web application providing an intuitive GUI for interacting with the Covia federated AI grid.

## Key features

- Connect to decentralised / federated venues with decentralised IDs (W3C DIDs)
- View assets and operations available on the grid
- Invoke operations with arbitrary inputs and get results
- View historical jobs / audit history

## Resources

- [Covia Website](https://covia.AI)
- [Documentation](https://docs.covia.ai)
